title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Nutrition and
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Nutrition and 

Health Claims made on Foods) (Amendment) Regulations 2021. 

(2)The Principal Regulations, the European Union (Nutrition and Health 
Claims made on Foods) (Amendment) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 458 of 2015), 
the European Union (Nutrition and Health Claims made on Foods) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 154 of 2017), the European Union 
(Nutrition and Health Claims made on Foods) (Amendment) Regulations (S.I. 
No. 176 of 2018) and these Regulations may be cited together as the European 
Union (Nutrition and Health Claims made on Foods) Regulations 2014 to 2021.

text_raw:
2.

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting 

after the definition of “EC Regulation 1924/2006” the following definition: 

“‘EU Regulation 2019/343’ means Commission Regulation (EU) 2019/343 of 
28 February 20191 ;”.
text_norm: 3 regulation 2(1) principal regulation amended inserting definition ec regulation 1924 2006 following definition eu regulation 2019 343 mean commission regulation (eu) 2019 343 28 february 20191

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 4. Regulation 12 of the Principal Regulations is amended—
text_raw:
4. Regulation 12 of the Principal Regulations is amended— 

(a) 

in paragraph 1, by substituting “Subject to paragraphs (2) and 
(2A)” for “Subject to paragraph (2)”, and 

(b) by inserting after paragraph 2, the following: 

“(2A) Paragraph (1) shall not apply to the term “tonic”, it being 
subject to a valid exemption from the application of Article 1(3) 
of EC Regulation 1924/2006, under Article 1 of EU Regulation 
2019/343 and the conditions laid down in the Annex thereto”. 

1 OJ No. L 62, 1.3.2019, p. 1. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st May, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [243] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 May, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health.

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Regulations give effect to Commission Regulation (EU) 2019/343 of 28 
February 2020, adopted under Article 1(4) of EC Regulation 1924/2006. Article 
1 of Commission Regulation (EU) 2019/343 exempted the generic descriptors 
listed in its Annex from the application of Article 1(3) of EC Regulation 
1924/2006, subject to the conditions laid down in that Annex. In particular, each 
exemption is only valid in the Member States specified in the Annex. The term 
“tonic” is the only term which is subject to a valid exemption in Ireland under 
Article 1 of Commission Regulation (EU) 2019/343 and the conditions laid 
down in the Annex thereto. 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Nutrition and Health Claims 
made on Foods) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 11 of 2014) in the manner specified 
in these Regulations. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Nutrition and Health 
Claims made on Foods) (Amendment) Regulations 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [243] 5
